physical_object.name: closed dark gray notebook or laptop

assignments.utilization_method: Slide one hand underneath to grasp a single corner while the rest of the notebook hangs below the fist. The bulk of the notebook supplies noticeable mass, so lifting then swinging it downward gives strong inertial pull similar to a sledge-hammer action. Bringing the notebook’s flat edge to meet the desk produces a solid, vibration-rich impact through the rigid cover back into the user’s hand.

Hold the pen vertically on the desk with the clicker end up. Repeatedly depress the clicker with the thumb or index finger. The built-in spring delivers clear downward travel, increasing resistance and a crisp mechanical click at full depression, followed by an automatic return—closely matching the tactile feedback of the red push-button.
